TopicTitle: How to get a fresh version of KSP 0.19?

Articles.Content: Is there anyway to get a fresh version of KSP 0.19, i want a version that i just play around with mods on. (I have bought KSP)

This isn't possible, I'm afraid. You'll just have to wait until the mods are updated to 0.20, and remember to make a backup in the future, I do and have a version of 0.19.1 sitting on my computer right now.
Most mods work without any problems on 0.20.
